name: Pool 2099
overview: A playable demo futuristic pool type game from Darren McKie, released in 1995. Ricochet around and hit all the locations of the bumpers that match your color. The bumpers will stay in place, there are no pockets in this game until the very end, just trying to hit all your locations before your opponent does. If you hit one of your pegs a second time it will light back up. When you have hit all your pegs\bumpers a hole will open, sink your ball and you win!
